context.title: Entry
context.description: An entry, possibly with a shallow or deep history, defines which state is to be activated first in a state machine or region.

context.title: State
context.description: States are central elements of a state machine.

context.title: Expressions
context.description: Expressions are used to declare events, variables etc. and to define behavior.

context.title: Transition
context.description: A transition is the transfer of one state to another. Transitions are diagrammed as arrows. They can carry events and actions, but don't need to.
